content.detailedDescription: I was letting the dogs out and from the corner of my eye i saw what i thought was a falling star.  it was bigger than normal.  it was falling at a rapid speed like normal and then it stopped and hovered. it was falling from the northwest.  shortly after about 2 minutes or so 2 airplanes came from the north up to the ufo/object and circled it.  i ran inside to tell my husband we sat outside for at least 20 minutes watching the planes circle this object.  we let the dogs back in and when i went back outside the object was gone and the planes.
content.summary: Falling star/fireball

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in the front yard watching to see which way
the clouds were moving. i noticed a glowing object moving
fast. not uncommon since we live close to an airport. however, when it passed above the clouds, i realized that it
was moving faster than military craft at the same altitude.
it made abrupt changes in directions and always maintained the same glow, unlike the reflection from a planes' wing.
===========================================================
i made these notes as soon as i went back into the house.
phoenix, arizona
03-12-2006
12:40 pm

a shiny object was observed coming from the s.S.E., at an excessive speed. it was moving much faster than a jet. from the time it was first seen in the southernly sky until it disappeared into the eastern horizon, was less than three minutes.
when it was first seen it was coming from the s.S.E.. it passed at about forty-five degrees upward in the east sky. about twenty degrees from vertical, it abruptly changed course to the n.W., and came to a complete stop. it then sped off to the s e for a second or two and abruptly changed course toward the east and rapidly sped toward  the
horizon and out of sight. it maintained the same glow for the entire time it was in sight.
content.summary: Brightly glowing, extremely fast, came to full stop, changed direction rapidly

content.detailedDescription:
i was at a friends house in aurora, co. he lives around the intersection of buckley road and arapahoe road. the time was around 4:30 pm. the temperature was about 32 degrees. it was overcast like it was about to snow. i am not sure how you can found out what the ceiling hieght of the clouds. we were walking from our car towards his house. i heard a jet going by, over head, so i looked up. as i watched the lear jet (from n.W. go to s.E.), i noticed something else at the same height. it was almost directly over head.

it looked like a paraglider. it was way way up there.

it was high enough where you couldn't see anyone hanging below it. it did have movement but not as much as you would expect from a paraglider. it would rise into the clouds and then drop back down. for perspective the lear jet that went by had a little bigger wing span than this thing.

if this was a sunny warm day it would have been a little easier to believe it was a paraglider. but it was fricken cold on the ground, i can't imagine how cold it would have been up there. and the added wierd thing was the center of the wing seemed to come apart and then go back together. it also seemed stationary as far as getting anywhere.

it eventually rose above the clouds and we lost it's location.

i have no idea what this thing was. best guess was it was a paraglider with some dude freezing his arse off. but i really have a hard time believeing that is what it was.

any ideas?
content.summary: Was with a friend and notice this object when we watched a lear jet go by.

content.detailedDescription:
On march 10, 2006 i was driving on highway 281 at 12:30 a.M. past the alamo dome in downtown san antonio when a large bright white light caught my eye ahead in the sky about 1-2 football fields high(the craft stayed about that far away the whole sighting). at first i thought it was a tower light or something like that but when i got closer to this object it eventually got right above my car in the middle of the highway. i then saw the bottom of the object. it was triangular in shape with red and blue lights on the three corners blinking. i watched it until i had passed it.

astonished and terrified, i decided to take the next turnaround and go back and see if what i saw was real or not. when i got back to the place of the first sighting, i  no longer saw the craft in the middle of the road but instead i saw the object near the lookout tower on the opposite side of the highway to the right of the tower. i then decided to take the next turnaround and find a spot to park on the side of the road to get a better look. but when i got near the tower again on the highway there was a 2nd craft that was smaller and had red and orange lights as opposed to the red and blue lights of the larger craft. i should also note that every time i saw these things during the hour of my sighting the crafts top bright light kept turning on and off randomly.

when i saw this second craft i got scared because it proceeded to come straight towards me. this smaller red and orange craft eventually went right over me like the larger one did before. this craft looked like the first one did, triangular in shape only with red and orange lights on the bottom at the three corners. it also had a top bright light as well. it passed me and went to the right of me on the highway and then immediately changed directions and joined the larger craft on the left side of me on the highway quite fast. at this point i was not about to pull over and stop as these things were just too close for comfort. i was shaking, i honestly don���t know hwy i was so scared.

instead i just kept taking turnarounds and went in circles about 3 times until they disappeared. i saw them going back and forth across highway 281 every time i turned around. it is almost as if they were following me, playing some kind of game. it���s kind of  egocentric of me to think that these things were there only for me but at the time is how i felt which is probably why i did not want to stop on the side of the road for a constant look at these things.

when they were no longer to be seen i headed back to my original destination point, home. about 5-10 minutes later i was near the university of incarnate word still on highway 281 when i saw the small red and orange craft yet again on my left side no less than a football field high. i could not believe that it was near me again. it proceeded to cross my path giving me another view of its bottom and headed to my right until i passed it up. 

so i took the next turnaround yet again and when i got back it was gone. i then went ahead and drove a few more minutes before taking the next turnaround to finally go home. but when i got back the larger blue and red craft had returned and was approaching my left side until it got right overhead of me again. this time however i saw a bright beam of light that looked like those airplane beams you see near an airport or major highway shoot out of the bottom of the craft and proceeded to point it evrywhere. when i say everywhere i mean it pointed it at cars, buildings and houses nearby. the odd thing was it never once pointed it at me. at least i think, though now that i think about it when i saw the craft overhead the light was so bright i had to shield my eyes for a second so it might have shined it on me at once. it very much looked to me like it was searching for something. after it got done with the beam it went on its way to the right of me and i lost site of it when i got too far from it. i should note that when this happened i got the best close up side view of the larger craft. it looked like a disk from the side. i was scared enough that i went home.

before i got home however i saw the small red and orange craft again, flying over 281 and towards my neighborhood near brook hollow blvd until i lost sight of it beyond the trees on the horizon.

when i got home it was around 1:40 a.M.

i hope to hear something of this strange occurence in the near future as i am confused to what those things were. someone else had to of seen these things. they were just way too obvious and apparent. i ruled out airplanes and helicopters because of the shape and movement of these things plus the fact that there was absolutely no sound of engines. definately the most bizare and scary moment of my life. i did not take any photos nor did i film it as i did not have such devices handy at the time. this is my story as best as i can describe it. 

thank you for listening to my sighting.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was driving home from downtown san antonio and witnessed a series of strange crafts fly around my vacinity for an hour or so while i was driving on highway 281.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car, and for whatever reason i looked up at the sky and saw what looked like 2 headlights. what caught my attention was the fact that there were no blinking lights on the craft. as i continued driving i noticed it was getting closer. i lost track of it for a couple of minutes, because of some buildings and trees i was driving by. once i located the object again, i realized it it was taking a strange shape. at one point i thought it was a blimp because of a low-humming sound it was expelling. as i neared my destination, i can make-out a triangular shape, with about 4-6 white lights on each side,and a red light in the center. it continued its path, until it eventually disappeared into the sky.
content.summary: Triangular- shaped, white lights on each side, with a red light in the center

content.detailedDescription: I and a friend were waiting on a tennis court in the wood ranch park for two other players to show up. the lights had not yet warmed up enough to come on. these objects caught my attention as they traveled through the sky. i thought they were balls of light. these were round balls of white light moving through the atmosphere quickley but smoothly. i was completely amazed to witness these luminous spheres traveling before my eyes. i told my friend dennis to look quick look at that and they were gone. they just disappeared.
content.summary: Approximately seven to nine white round ball shaped spheres traveled through the sky for abour 7 seconds and they were gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I was letting my dog out at around 10 p.M. we live in a small hilltown area at the foot of the berkshires. i usually look up to see the stars as where we live they can be very bright and pretty as if you could just pluck them out of the sky.

anyhow, i noticed one unusaully bright "star" and realized it was glowing in colors. not white like a regular star, but white was one of the alternating colors. we do get plane traffic as we are on the flight path of planes coming from new york to bradley int'l airport in ct. i worked at bdl airport as a police officer for 22 1/2 years so i know what planes look like and whate color lights they normally have. this was not a plane.

i then got my binoculars to see if i could see it any closer. the binoculars actually did help me to see the ufo more clearly. it was at that time using the bincoulars that i noticed a secondary smaller ufo that was also stationary and had rotating red lights. the smaller ufo was disc shaped and the larger ufo was diamond shaped. suddenly the smaller red ufo took off fast and was blocked by the tree line. (i was looking out in a south-west direction from my house). i watched the larger ufo which did not move, stayed stationary for over an hour and rotated lights from white to yellow to green to red to blue and sometimes two colors at the same time. the overall outline was white diamond shaped. 

my husband works the evening shift and was due home and i was hoping he would get home in time to verify what i was seeing so i wouldn't think i was imagining it. he came home at 11:00 p.M. and i  immediately showed him it and then he got the binoculars and confirmed everything from the diamond shape to the colors. he said it could be a comet, but i don't think comets stay in one spot for one hour? or rotate in colors? it stayed there and we were tired of looking at it as looking through binculars for a long time gets tiring. it was too far way that i knew my camera would not be able to take a good picture or clear enough picture so i didn't bother. now i wish i tried at least! we watched tv for awhile and i went back out to see if it was still there, but it was gone. this was about 11:20 p.M. i looked for it the next few nights just in case i mistook it for a star or whatever, but it has not been back since.
content.summary: Diamond shaped ufo remained stationary for over one hour. alternated colors from red, yellow, blue and green, sometimes 2 colors at one time. secondary smaller ufo under larger one- all red lights- took off fast

content.detailedDescription: Went to the bathroom and noticed a bright pure white light where there has never been one in 16 years living here. i watched it and it sped back and forth and then started to oscillate and dim and brighten. then it looked like an hour glass shaped light and moved back and forth and up and down in a jumpy motion. this was the event of the 6th and it was north easterly. after about 25 minutes it just totally disappeared. this happen 6 and 7 march 06. the 7th it was in the north westerly and did a simliliar routine but it was at 10:30 pm and moved quite a distance in seconds then stopped and oscillated and jerked up and down and back and forth side to side. i am  retired from the air force, air force space command 23sops ( 23rd space operations squadron ) and this is a second sighting for me in 10 years having another in the mid 90,s that was mind opening.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Rapid moving then stopping and oscillating

content.detailedDescription: I was stargazing, laying on my deck enjoying the view of the galaxy and i eventually saw stars that were stationary, start to move in a certain direction.  i saw a couple of them. sometimes they would change direction which would rule out satellite activity. they seemed much higher than the distance of satellites as well. i would like to discuss this with others since there was another posting on this site today regarding the same thing. my e m ai l is  r e g a l 1 1 1 at comcast. net.  please email me at regal111@comcast.Net
content.summary: Stars in sky standing still then moving in a certain direction

content.detailedDescription: I'm at home outside in my backyard just looking at the night sky noticed these bright balls of fire like stars but color was orange to yellow then red noticed visible movement there are three sometimes more keeping various positions consistently over 10 days now they all seem to move sucessively have yet to see them take off more than the edges of the constellations nearby this is wild they appear closer than any other stars and yet seem to be attempting to blend in by holding these positions i know you get stuff every day but ive been out there everynight and they haven't disappeared yet its more than my eyes adjusting to the dark these balls of fire move way outside a mere wobble i'm amazed and rather anxious to know if these are documented and if not they should be
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: For 10 days 3+ ufo's keep same positions over night sky near stars clearly visible movement

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in our family room watching television late at night with my husband when i saw,  through the window which faces highway l4 and a large wooded park across the highway (called bird park),  a large white circular orb which caught my eye as it was up high descending in a downward direction angled to the left. it landed somewhere deep into this park.   it caught eye because we occasionally see helicopters fly overhead going to the u.M. hospital and airplanes.  i have even seen an occasional shooting star, but this was not any  of those three things mentioned.  this was much larger and very bright white and was slowly descending  into the wooded area  called bird park which is behind my house across highway l4, close to newport road. the size of this white circle, or orb, was very similar to one i remember seeing directly above my neighbor's yard about 7 years ago. on this occassion, it was during the summer, and i shot straight up in bed with my eyes wide open and remember the bedroom being flooded with extremely bright white light. our shades were up.   i went to the bedroom window and looked outand saw a large white circular, brightly glowing orb hoovering in a stationary mode above my neighbor's home in the front yard area,  high in the sky, with a thin bluish white beam coming down from it at an angle touching my neighbor's yard.  within seconds of standing there viewing it, the beam withdrew into the white orb and the orb ascended straight upwards and disappeared.  my husband was not awakened by any of this, but i was.  i want to the bathroom afterwards and looked back out the window as a reality check to understand that i actually did see what i described to you. i was not frightened by this, but did call a friend the next day and tell her about what i had witnessed.
content.summary: Bright white,  glowing, large , round, circular, glowing  orb

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving down the roadway i noticed a bright blue light in the sky it was still for about 10 seconds than it accelerated at an extremely high rate of speed. it shot down into some near by woods,after passing by the woods we noticed nothing. i do not know what this was but the two of us saw the exact same thing. it was not like anything i have ever seen before or since.
content.summary: Blue ball like light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to sea world at the wendy's on opposite corner of the sea world entrance. we were waiting in traffic at the red light in between sea world and wendys
i always watch the sky and was talking about how pretty the blue sky and cotton candy looking clouds looked. when i spotted the shiny object coming from behind the clouds and told the person in the back seat to look at it. but he couldn't see it he wears glasses 24/7 to correct his vision.
then it went back behind the clouds. so i told my friend to look at a certain cloud formation and that it would be coming out from behind it. i say it come into sight but again he could not. the a helicopet came into view much closer than the ufo but in the same path direction. and then about 25 seconds later the ufo disappeared.
content.summary: Came from behind clouds into free air then into clouds again and back out and shortly after disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some sky pictures at 10:00am this morning (03/06/2006) and got these two pictures with the same objects in them. i took twelve shots and these were the only two with any objects in them. the second picture (the one with the objects behind a tree branch) was taken less than a minute after the first one was taken. the camera was pointed in an easterly direction and the objects were moving in nw direction. in the past six months i have captured objects of this kind and also white round ones and also white mixed with other colors. with the enlargements there are a total of four pictures. this is the fourth picture.
content.summary: Fourth photo taken from my yard shooting random skyshots

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some sky pictures at 10:00am this morning (03/06/2006) and got these two pictures with the same objects in them. i took twelve shots and these were the only two with any objects in them. the second picture (the one with the objects behind a tree branch) was taken less than a minute after the first one was taken. the camera was pointed in an easterly direction and the objects were moving in nw direction. in the past six months i have captured objects of this kind and also white round ones and also white mixed with other colors. with the enlargements there are a total of four pictures. if i am unable to post all four i will make another report with the other photo in it.
content.summary: Four to five objects above my yard

content.detailedDescription:
I just turned off of m65 east onto curtis road. just as i was coming up the hill, on the left hand side the craft lit up like the sun. i knew it was a ufo when i first saw it because it was so huge and bright. there was no sounds and no wind. it was hovering and it had either 2 or 4 sets of lights on the bottom of the craft,i am not sure if it was2 or 4 because 1 set of lights went on and then they went off and another set of lights came on. the lights were alternating from front and back to side to side, and the lights were turning off and on faster and faster. i would say the craft was at least the size of a football field,it
was circular. it was just hovering above the trees, with the lights increasing with speed. out of the top of the craft came 6 red and blue, looked like they were half red and half blue , not sure what to call them, but they were about 6 foot in diameter and round . they flew in the sky,until they looked about the size of a dime. there were 2 airforce jets in the air coming toward them , as the jets approached, they split into 2 groups of 3. one jet went after one group while the other jet went after the other group. as the lights on the craft blinked about one second apart from the other set of lights on the bottom of the big craft, it dissapeared into thin air right before my eyes. the jets chased the 6 little ones for about 30 minutes, then theywere all out of my sight and hearing. i was in total awe and i will never forget it. i know what i saw and nobody can tell me different.
content.summary: I saw an unidentified aircraft  hovering over the treetops.

content.detailedDescription:
(yes i know i've told you about three sightings in one week, but i wasn't lying about any of them. just telling ya.)i was taking my friend home again and again it was me, my dad, and my friend (on a different night.) we went down the same route as last time down 41 and up 14. after we dropped her off again at her house, i said dad lets look for ufo's again. so we did. we drove down the same road we dropped her off at. then, my dad said what are those 12 lights lined up in a row?(they were flickering and reflectors don't do that) i didnt know and my dad said lets find out. so we drove down right where the thing was it was landed. about 30 ft in front of us. im not sure if these were reflectors or not, but 1st my dad said it was a tractor. but then we stopped right in front of it and pulled off the road a bit. we turned our lights off and the lights did too. i still wondered if they were reflectors or not, but when we looked closer the lights looked as if they were floating because nothing was holding them up (i think im not quite sure because it was too dark to see much of anything.It looked like a telephone line were holding these things together, but the "telephone line" didnt run vertically,as usual, it ran horizontally across the road but the same height as a telephone wire.) then when we passed it i looked over and a huge dimmed circle lit up a little but it was very dim. now that i think of it it couldve been a huge light very huge about the size of a tire maybe a little smaller. we then drove home and i looked back and nothing was lit up. 

p.S. mufon, was this object a reflector or something more? if it wasn't a reflector what was it? please respond asap.
content.summary: 12 lights lined up sparkle and then big dimmed white light as we pass.

content.detailedDescription: I did not notice object until i downloaded photographs from my camera to my pc.  i was taking snaps of the horizon and sunset when this picture was taken.
content.summary: When looking at holiday pictures i noticed a strange object in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Today,while driving to my mom's house.I saw this metallic object on my right,above a pineapple field,in the county of sabana hoyos.I slowed down a bit-out of my curiosity-and i thought i saw an airplane traveling toward's san juan.A couple of street's down,a horde of people were parked on the side of the road,standing out in the open field,and i knew they were seeing the same thing.I picked my space and went toward's them. 

there it was.A cigar shaped "something" hovering at about 200 ft. from the ground.This shiny object had clear visible window's,it had an aprox. length of maybe 30 or 40 ft.-maybe more-and it's nose,or rather one of it's end's was tilted as if it was looking down-depending on the perspective. 

the sighting lasted roughly 10 to 12 mins. and then that thing was gone.I mean it vanished like a ghost.Some eye witnesses had cameras and cell phone's calling and capturing it on them.Not me.
content.summary: I was surprised to see one,not to mention the weather was perfect,not a cloud nearby.

content.detailedDescription: Beverly trout reporting a sighting reported by a witness on her way to work as a speech pathologist at the va hospital at 5:00 a.M., with sighting lasting some 19 of the 20 minutes it took to get to the va hospital.  witness was driving east, and when she turned right (south) on 86th street in west des moines, she saw directly east of her a brilliantly white-lit triangle, though she says she believes she was seeing the rear of the triangle.  (she says she was not seeing the underside of the object)  at first she thought it was stationary, but when she had continuing driving south for two (2) miles, and turned left (east) onto douglas to drive straight to the va hospital, she realized that the object was now se of her position, so the object must have been moving.  by the time she arrived at the va hospital, she'd lost sight of the object.  it takes 20 minutes for witness to get to work from the suburb of johnston, so she believes she had the ufo in sight for 19 minutes during her drive.  the va hospital is in a fairly heavily wooded area with tall trees, so it's very reasonable that the surrounding vegetaion would very soon shut off sight of the object.  more later.  no sound.  more information to come.
content.summary: Brilliant, steady, white lighted object seen suburb of des moines & des moines

content.detailedDescription: The circular dusty lights styed over my car as i drove for about 5 m. until i came to a stop light intercection. then the lights still dancing in a circle perfectly without hitting each other, got further way from us going up and vanished. i did not know what to think, except i'm sure they were not spot lights. i could not take my eyes of of it,seemed like these unknown dusty round lights were entertaining me. it was really interesting. i thought it might have been related to ufo activity.
content.summary: Driving on highway 12 lodi california, when i noticed 5 or 6 glowing dusty circular lights right above my windshield, these lights where dancing in a perfect  circle and stayed on top of my car as if following me as i drove along.

content.detailedDescription: I believe (not quite sure) my dad was showing me some decorations for our pumpkins outside. i was looking at the clear night sky when a bright light caught my eye to the nw. it appeared to look as bright as venus. i thought it was venus, but it started to come at me slowly. i told my dad to look at the object and when i did it changed shape (a lime-green line i think) and went in a whole different direction as fast as a satellite in the sky. this light still starts in that position on some nights and comes after me i think still. but it never changed shape like that. it was very weird. i was puzzled and i finally went inside the house.
content.summary: Same bright light in same direction comes at me and once turned different shape and flew different direction.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at our home in 1966 and age 6. i went outside onto the back patio because it was warm. i had gotten up to see my dad go to work i guess. i was just up. when i turned to come back in i saw to my right a small orange glowing diamond shaped "thing" app. 8-10" in hight. totally silent. it was bouncing on it's bottom point but not touching the ground as it was moving along the edge of the foundation. i would guess it was moving at about 16" skips, or spaces going to the left. i watched it go from the dirt of the flower bed across the concrete patio and into the other flower bed. app. 8' in all. then ran screaming into the house.
 i have wonderd what the hell that thing was for the last 41 yrs. any clues guys? sure was weird.
thank you, newman riley
content.summary: Small diamond shaped orange 8-10" obeject bounching on ground at base of home foundation, silent.

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting in the livingroom watching cartoons (yes, cartoons), when laura noticed an odd, bright light across the street in the sky growing larger. so, naturally, we wanted to watch, and find out what it was. so we watched through the bay windows, as the light, in a tear-drop-like shape seemed to decent rappidly as it grew larger in size. then, out of no where, it slowly faded to where it was barely visable, and vaguely resembled airplane lights, but in a differant pattern and in the wrong placements, then flew upward, and over in an eastward direction. it went on around the side of the house, where we seemed to see the underside of this.. thing. it looked as though it had a star-diamond shaped lighter area, with lights at the points. then we ran inside and started locking doors, because at this point, we were petrafied.
content.summary: Large bright light, seeming to proceed closer, decended, light faded & flew east, dissapreared.

content.detailedDescription:
I wish to talk to mufon please call me and i wish to have photos verified
ca
content.summary: Ongoing events ... i have video and hundreds of photos

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to walmart in sun prairie on saturday night headed west on hwy 19..I was driving and to my right ahead i noticed lights..They were low to the ground. there are lots of farms in the area...I wondered what it was...Thought it might be a helicopter..Then as i drove it appeared to be in the south...Then there were a bunch of trees i had to pass ...I cant remember how long it took me but anyway when i got past the trees the light was gone there wasnt even a spot of light in the sky its like it vanished or landed in one of the cornfields nearby. this is the 8th ufo i have seen i was not scared...I am having a rally in dc to stop the coverup of ufos and aliens by the gov in july and wonder if i will be seeing alot because of it..I have been abducted by the nordics since age 7 when i saw my first ufo
content.summary: I saw some lights that were low to the ground first they were to the north then they were to the south then they just disappeared

content.detailedDescription: 20 or so ufo,s hover all night long over richfield minnesota
content.summary: 20 or so ufo's hover in the sky over richfield minnesota

content.detailedDescription: Driving northbound through suburban detroit neighborhood (roseville) i, sitting in passenger seat, noticed in a clear night sky an extremely bright meteor shape ball of light (with small attached tail) coming down at slight angle (22-25 degrees)toward the north-northwest (direction we were also traveling) several hundred feet above us  and brighter than any other object in the sky. my wife, the driver, noticed me looking out the window and looked out the windshield a second or two before the object "burned out" (her decription) as a way of disappearing. both of us at first thought of a meteor just before impact because it was so close and bright right above us and no smoke or trail remained after the disappearance. there was no other traffic in the area during the sighting and the object seemed to come down in a matter of 5-6 seconds for the mile or so it seemed to travel between 10 and 11 mile roads in roseville (designated road names in our adjoining cities spaced one mile apart). no words were spoken between the two of us during the event perhaps due to the awe induced by seeing such a bright (whitish/blue) object flying alongside us and only a few hundred feet above. as the object disappeared so suddenly, we assumed a meteor being burned up in a final flashing gasp overhead, rather than a craft zipping away in another direction. no report of debris was reported later in the area and no mention of a similar sighting was read or heard by my wife or myself. no report was made to local authorities until a few days later after contact with a member of michigan based mufon. no picture documentation could be obtained, although usually a disposable camera is available in our car's glove compartment. not that night, however, but a new one is now waiting in the car for the next potential encounter. everyone who drives should have one at the ready for such possible occasions.
content.summary: Decending teardrop ufo flew overhead parrelling our driving along road for 6 to 7 seconds beford 'winking out' while approx. directly overhead

content.detailedDescription:
My dad, me, and my friend were driving on 41 to take her home at about 10:00 (it takes 15 min. to get there, and 15 min. back.) we passed the gravel road and turned on 14. my dad said "what is that in the sky?." the object look like a bright star that eventually faded. i saw a blue light run through the sky, but the blue light(not the light in the sky) turned out to be the light from mcdonalds. we turned right, and dropped her off at her house. this time we continued going down the road. then we turned down the gravel road in which we passed before. as we were driving i told my dad to listen to a song on my ipod. after the song i wanted him to hear another. i had dropped my ipod on the floor earlier that day. i have dropped it on the floor a number of times, but it's never done this. my ipod began to freeze up and nothing worked on it. then the light in the back seat didn't work (it hasn't worked since), but that could be from a bulb that burned out. my dad told me during that, that he saw 3 brights ligts (reddish yellow) shining out in the field right next to us (right where we saw the first light, but that one was in the sky, this was on the ground.Then they dimmed, because i never saw them.) i told him my ipod wasn't working, and i also said i never see any ufo's. well right after that i began looking out the windows to see if i saw anything. i looked in the back window and saw 2 lights that flickered, and then 3 (also reddish yellow.) there aren't any houses out that way either, just a few but their lights would've disappeared in the distance. i thought maybe it was a car, and i didn't say anything for a long time. but the lights started getting brighter and brighter, and faster. i said "dad look at those lights in your mirror." we were far past from when we first saw the lights, and i still saw them very clear and still very bright. we stopped at a stop sign, and then my dad floored it. these lights didn't make a sound, were too spaced out to be car lights, and also car light travels these did not. we finally turned off the road and got on the highway. i looked back and could still see them. then i looked again and a small patch of grass lit up. my dad also said he was getting a really sick feeling in his stomach every time i told him about the lights. after i didn't see them anymore (which was right after the patch of grass lit up), my ipod began to work again. we arrived home that night at 10:12 p.M. approx. but i said before it takes 15 min. to get there, and 15 min. back. we should've arrived home at 10:32 p.M. appox. why did we arrive so early? did the ufo's stop time? i don't know what i saw that night, but i've never seen anything like it, and it was strange. 

thank you for letting me tell you about this experience.
content.summary: My dad and i were chased by 3 lights!
